tool_description: Get Animes and Mangas from MyAnimeList (Unofficial)
title: MyAnimeList

api_list.name: Search for Mangas with Amount of Results
api_list.description: Search for Mangas and get the given amount of results. Maximum results is `10`.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description:
Limit the amount of results.
Max results and default is `10`.

required_parameters.name: search_query
required_parameters.description: Search Query used by search on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/manga/search/{search_query}/{amount}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Manga
api_list.description: Get Manga by using the manga id from MyAnimeList. You can obtain the manga id by using search.

required_parameters.name: manga_id
required_parameters.description:
ID of the Manga.
Can be found by using the search endpoint or by searching on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/manga/{manga_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Manga Recommendations
api_list.description:
Get recommendation pairs that contain a previous manga and a new manga that fits the previous one.
Results always contain `100` Recommendations. Next page returns the next `100` Recommendations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/manga/recommendations/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Anime Recommendations
api_list.description:
Get recommendation pairs that contain a previous anime and a new anime that fits the previous one.
Results always contain `100` Recommendations. Next page returns the next `100` Recommendations.

api_list.name: Get Anime
api_list.description: Get Anime by using the anime id from MyAnimeList. You can obtain the anime id by using search.

required_parameters.name: anime_id
required_parameters.description:
ID of the Anime.
Can be found by using the search endpoint or by searching on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{anime_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.synopsis:
Brutal murders, petty thefts, and senseless violence pollute the human world. In contrast, the realm of death gods is a humdrum, unchanging gambling den. The ingenious 17-year-old Japanese student Light Yagami and sadistic god of death Ryuk share one belief: their worlds are rotten.

For his own amusement, Ryuk drops his "Death Note" into the human world. Light stumbles upon it, deeming the first of its rules ridiculous: the human whose name is written in this note shall die. However, the temptation is too great, and Light experiments by writing a felon's name, which disturbingly enacts his first murder.

Aware of the terrifying godlike power that has fallen into his hands, Light—under the alias "Kira"—follows his wicked sense of justice with the ultimate goal of cleansing the world of all evil-doers. The meticulous mastermind detective L is already on his trail, but as Light's brilliance rivals L's, the grand chase for Kira turns into an intense battle of wits that can only end when one of them is dead.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

api_list.name: Search for an anime
api_list.description:
Search for an anime using the search_query.
Search uses the search from MyAnimeList.

required_parameters.name: search_query
required_parameters.description: Search Query used by search on [https://myanimelist.net/](url).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com/anime/search/{search_query}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
